title: Indian gold imports hit three-year low as prices jump -govt source
text:
Indian gold imports hit three-year low as prices jump -govt source

Stock Markets 7 minutes ago (Oct 04, 2019 14:40)

© Reuters. Indian gold imports hit three-year low as prices jump -govt source NEW DELHI/MUMBAI, Oct 4 (Reuters) - India's imports in September plunged 68% from a year earlier to the lowest level in more than three years as record domestic gold prices curbed retail buying, a government source said on Friday. India imported 26 tonnes of gold in September, down from 81.71 tonnes a year ago, said the source said, who is not authorised to speak to the media. In value terms, the September imports fell 51% to $1.28 billion, he added.

Indian gold imports hit three-year low as prices jump -govt source
